title: PBE
body: Hi. I recently got a PBE account and tried to install it. However, when it got to about 39%, it stopped and gave me "Error Code 004". Can someone help? We've been trying to install it all day, but haven't had any luck.

replies.body: I checked my connection and it all seems to be fine... I also tried the hextech repair tool twice and it just came up saying the same thing... is there something I'm missing?

Typically these 004 errors can be tied to something that's causing your connection with our patching servers to become unstable. Let's go through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure you're able to download the whole patch in one go.
